Hoxud County is a county in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region and is under the administration of the Bayin'gholin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture. It contains an area of 12,753 km2 (4,924 sq mi). According to the 2002 census, it has a population of 60,000.
